column4: my latest vim is 6.4 in aptitude.. but vim is at 7.0 -- how do I know if it's just not available or if my package list is updated?
does aptitude automatically update its list?
hmm.. it doesn't really show a newer version either.. in fact, it shows 6.3 .. I must have gotten some deb packages for 6.4
strange  - I thought 6.06 was up to vim 6.4
oic - well don't mind me - I have 7 installed everywhere
